name: Catch & Cook Crab
description: A trip for people who love seafood and have always wanted to catch their own dinner. We bring fine dining to the beach. Your fishing guide and chef will teach you how and where to catch the tastiest BC Dungeness crab.  Fishing is from the docks using casting traps.  Then, our chef  will show you how to prepare your catch and cook it West Coast style, we don’t boil it that’s for sure! Finish the tour with a fine lunch of mouth watering crab, it doesn’t get any better than this!
